attributes.action: allow us as british citizens to fly the flag of our great nation were ever we please ,.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need to become more patriotic , allow us to fly or st georges flag , st andrews flag etc were ever we may please ,without the worry of being told to removeit in case we offend anyone, we need to instill some pride in or great country,,,WE NEED TO BE BRITISH AND PROUD!!!
